titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: REHABILITATION ASSESSMENT TEAM TYPE - Description

div.p: An indication of whether the CARE PROFESSIONAL TEAM undertaking a Rehabilitation Assessment, is specialised or non-specialised.
This information is recorded for the purposes of the National Tariff Payment System.

p.b: This data item is included in Commissioning Data Set version 6-2, but should not be submitted until further development by the Department of Health and Social Care has been undertaken.
